name: TesteinRun
author: Testein
helpMarkDown: Allows you to trigger your Testein test/suite/application and watch logs in VSTS

inputs.name: userToken
inputs.label: User Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Your user token. Could be found under your user settings in Testein

inputs.name: type
inputs.label: Target type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type of the target to run

inputs.name: id
inputs.label: Target Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Id of test/suite/application to run. Could be found on test/suite/application details page

inputs.name: downloadDetails
inputs.label: Download Details
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true, Testein task logs will be downloaded to 'Testein-Task-{taskId}.zip'.

inputs.name: downloadReport
inputs.label: Download Report
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true, Testein report will be downloaded to 'Testein-Report-{runId}.html'.
